name: Love is blind and also a maze(Made in c++)
name_original: Love is blind and also a maze(Made in c++)
description:
This is a basic 2d game, what you can move around using W S A D and also you can place infinite amount of torches by pressing F. Your goal is to find your love, who is hiding inside the maze.

The blue bar on top is your loneliness meter that if reaches max - maze scrambles.

The red bar is your love bar, that you can increase by collecting hearths. When it reaches a certain point a path will show itself. A Path to your loved one.

The red bar on the bottom shows your loved one loneliness, when it reaches max, you loose.

Game is in super alpha, beta etc. But playable.
